name: Bird Hunting Season 3D: Real Sniper Shooting 2017
name_original: Bird Hunting Season 3D: Real Sniper Shooting 2017
description:
The hunting season is ON!
Bird Hunting Season: Real Sniper Shooting 2017” is an action, shooting, and hunter challenging game is now available on the store. The bird hunting is one of the most predominant, intellectual, and interesting game made in precisely 3D amazing and modern Jungle Environment. Enjoy the latest sniper hunt game by shooting ducks, seagulls, pigeons and many more flying birds. This is the most awesome and nerve wracking hunting season game that is help you to improve your shooting skills in air. Shoot down your targets and make the most of hunting game in this season. Take a trip to realistic birds valley in the beautiful forests to enjoy glorious shooting missions. Grab out a sniper, Rifle, and short guns and take position to hunt down these birds. Prove your sharp shooting skills and become an ultimate bird hunter. 
In Birds Hunting Sniper Season 2017 game will make you addicted as well as you will improve your skill to hunt real birds while going for a hunt in the jungle. Get ready for the birds Hunting without going into the jungle.

 Game Features:

- Amazing sniper rifle with scope to zoom. - Realistic controls for best shooting experience -Stunning birds and high quality 3D graphics and Sound Effects. - Real time Birds Hunting with animations - Multiple Levels with Different Environments and Birds.
Disclaimer: Hunting of innocent jungle birds is not recommended; this game is made for those who like birds hunting but don't want to kill jungle birds. We have brought to you the real forest bird hunting.
Share your feedback with us and let’s make it a better Bird hunting game together.
